Index >  SetCustomDSData

SetCustomDSData()

Description

Sets custom DS data to be used for scanning, the data is stored in a file. Custom DS data means a specific scanning profile.

Syntax

.SetCustomDSData(string fileName);

Parameters

<string> fileName

The absolute path of the file where the custom Data Source data is stored.

Return value

bool

When false is returned, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

GetCustomDSData()
